title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin compares Andy Reid to Bill Belichick at this point in their careers and why it wouldn't be crazy to think Reid surpasses Belichick in the next decade. He points out the main trait in each of the NFL's best quarterbacks that results in their success. He also presents a case for Aaron Rodgers being under the most pressure in the Divisional Round of the playoffs. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to defend the Chiefs as people argue for the Bills to be the best contender out of the AFC. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
